results.title: Love My Way: Spin Cycle
results.creator_credit: Claudia Karvan, John Edwards, Ian Watson, Brendan Cowell, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Showtime, Foxtel and Southern Star Entertainment
results.brief_description:
The groundbreaking, multiple award-winning drama series ‘Love My Way’ was one of the first Australian productions made exclusively for subscription television (Foxtel). This enabled Foxtel to allow the producers ‘absolute creative freedom…to carve out a piece of TV drama that was edgy, daring, provocative’ (Foxtel’s Brian Walsh).

Revolving around the untidy lives and complicated loves of a contemporary Australian blended family and their friends, ‘Love My Way’ was both critically acclaimed and highly successful, with a further two seasons produced following the initial ten episodes of Series 1.

Series 1, Episode 4 first aired on Foxtel on 6th December 2004.

results.title: Love My Way: A Different Planet
results.creator_credit: Claudia Karvan, John Edwards, Jessica Hobbs, Louise Fox, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Showtime, Foxtel and Southern Star Entertainment
results.brief_description:
The groundbreaking, multiple award-winning drama series ‘Love My Way’ was one of the first Australian productions made exclusively for subscription television (Foxtel). This enabled Foxtel to allow the producers ‘absolute creative freedom…to carve out a piece of TV drama that was edgy, daring, provocative’ (Foxtel’s Brian Walsh).

Revolving around the untidy lives and complicated loves of a contemporary Australian blended family and their friends, ‘Love My Way’ was both critically acclaimed and highly successful, with a further two seasons produced following the initial ten episodes of Series 1.

Series 1, Episode 8 first aired on Foxtel on 17th January 2005.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Claudia Karvan, John Edwards, Jessica Hobbs, Louise Fox, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Showtime, Foxtel and Southern Star Entertainment

results.title: Love my dog
results.creator_credit: Hal Roach, Hal Roach Studios and Robert F. McGowan
results.brief_description: Silent slapstick comedy featuring “Our Gang” and their efforts to prevent Farina’s beloved pooch being caught and put down by a dog-catcher. Cast includes Joe Cobb, Jackie Condon, Dick Gilbert, Allen “Farina” Hoskins, Scooter Lowry. Silent film with English captions.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Hal Roach, Hal Roach Studios and Robert F. McGowan

results.title: Love me, love my dog
results.brief_description: In Great Britain each year 70,000 accidents and 3,000 human casualties are caused by dogs on the roads, and we see how Barbara Woodhouse and the Croxley Canine Training Society train dogs and their owners in road safety.
